author: Niall Bourke
cite: L. Wang, Z. Wu, L. Chen, Y. Sun, W. Lin, G. Li, iBEAT V2. 0: a multisite-applicable, deep learning-based pipeline for infant cerebral cortical surface reconstruction, Nature Protocol, vol. 18(5), 2023, pp. 1488-1509

align_type.description: Only use when two modality are inputed. If =0, then the t2 modality will not align to t1 modality, assuming the t2 and t1 has been aligned

skullstripping.description: --skull_type: Whether need to do the skullstripping or not. If =0, will skip the skullstripping, assuming the input brain has done the skullstripping.If =1 (default), will do the skull stripping using the pipeline.

age.description: Age of the subject in months

description: Flywheel gear for iBEAT V2.0 - a deep learning-based pipeline for infant cerebral cortical surface reconstruction

t2.description: T2w input file (usually axial or isotropic reconstruction)

label: ibeat_v2
name: ibeat_v2
